sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { Container, Grid } from '@material-ui/core'; import Popup from './popup'; const JobList = ({ jobs, users, showPopup, setShowPopup }) => ( <>

Current Jobs

 {jobs.map(job => { return (
Course ID Term Type Num Positions State
{job.Courseid} {job.Term} {job.Type} {job.NumPositions} {job.State} {/* Change the popup to show applicants*/}
{users.map((user) => (
{showPopup && ( setShowPopup(false)}>

Email: {user.Email}

Name: {user.LName}, {user.FName}

 )}
))}


) })} ); export default JobList;
